subject: p19454978
History: History: F with fever, eval for pna.
Findings: The lung volumes are low. Mild fullness in the right hila may indicate early developing infection in the correct clinical setting. Opacity of the left base stable over multiple prior studies and most likely represents atelectasis. Moderate cardiomegaly is stable. No pneumothorax or pleural effusion.
Impression: Mild fullness in the right hila may indicate early developing infection in the correct clinical setting.
